author: Autor Generico
title: El Suprem avala registrar com a nascut a Espanya un nen nascut per gestaciÃ³ subrogada a l'estranger
text:
El Tribunal Suprem autoritza que els nadons nascuts per gestaciÃ³ subrogada es puguin inscriure al Registre Civil com a nascuts a Espanya. Fins ara, aquest trÃ mit nomÃ©s estava permÃ¨s per a les adopcions internacionals. L'alt tribunal diu que ha adoptat aquesta decisiÃ³ per poder protegir la intimitat del menor .
La sentÃ¨ncia de la Sala Civil dona la raÃ³ als pares d'un menor nascut a UcraÃ¯na, mitjanÃ§ant un ventre de lloguer , que van demanar poder canviar el lloc de naixement real pel del domicili de la parella, a l'estat espanyol.
Hi ha persones que recorren a la gestaciÃ³ subrogada per tenir un fill. CC0 En el seu moment, el personal del Registre Civil s'hi va negar i van portar el cas als tribunals, que va arribar fins a l'alt tribunal. Els magistrats diuen que el dret a la intimitat del menor permet que es pugui inscriure com nascut a Espanya per evitar que es faci pÃºblic que el van engendrar a travÃ©s de gestaciÃ³ subrogada, un mÃ¨tode ilÂ·legal a Espanya .
Llegeix tambÃ©
El testimoni d'una mare que va recÃ³rrer a la gestaciÃ³ subrogada: "La gestant ho fa per amor" RAC1 AixÃ­ s'equipara aquest tipus de naixement amb les adopcions internacionals . Ara bÃ©, hi ha associacions feministes que critiquen aquesta decisiÃ³ del Suprem perquÃ¨ diuen que no es tenen en compte els drets de les dones .

author: Via University
title: Yotes Finalize Spring Schedule; Coyote Football Family Day Scheduled for April 12
text:
Yotes Finalize Spring Schedule; Coyote Football Family Day Scheduled for April 12
VERMILLION, S.D. â€” The calendar has turned over to the third month of 2025 which means football returns to Vermillion, in the form of spring practice. Head coach Travis Johansen has announced the spring practice dates which culminates to the inaugural Coyote Football Family Day slated for April 12. Practice is set to begin on March 21 with the 15 officially sanctioned practices scattered throughout the month of March and April. Practices and workouts are closed to the general public. South Dakota's Pro Day is scheduled for Wednesday, March 26 that will see 15-20 Coyotes participate for pro scouts inside...
Read more at University of South Dakota Athletics

author: Dow Jones
title: UBS Says Data Stolen in Cyberattack on Supplier | MarketScreener Canada
text:
By Adria Calatayud
UBS Group said some information about the bank was stolen in a cyberattack on an external supplier that affected several companies.
"A cyberattack at an external supplier has led to information about UBS and several other companies being stolen. No client data has been affected," the bank said Wednesday. "As soon as UBS became aware of the incident, it took swift and decisive action to avoid any impact on its operations."
The UBS supplier, Chain IQ, last week said it had been targeted alongside 19 other companies in a cyberattack that led to a leak of data subsequently published on the dark web.
Swiss newspaper Le Temps earlier reported that data on more than 130,000 UBS employees were available online.
The company said at the time that the situation had been contained and that all necessary countermeasures were initiated.
Write to Adria Calatayud at adria.calatayud@wsj.com
(END) Dow Jones Newswires
06-18-25 0646ET
Share Â© Dow Jones - 2025

author: miansarimhameed
title: CADCHF: Bullish Reversal Potential - Long Trade Setup
text:
[](/u/miansarimhameed/)
CADCHF: Bullish Reversal Potential - Long Trade Setup
[OANDA:CADCHF](/symbols/CADCHF/)CAD/CHF
ðŸ“‰ Overview:
CADCHF is shifting from a downtrend to sideways movement, signaling a potential bullish reversal. A sharp bullish divergence and a strong 97% bullish market sentiment enhance the likelihood of an upward move.
ðŸ“Š Technical Analysis:
Transition from downtrend to sideways, coupled with a bullish divergence, sets the stage for a potential bullish reversal.
ðŸ“ˆ Market Sentiment:
A robust 97% bullish sentiment supports the potential strength of the upward reversal.
ðŸ“‰ Trade Strategy:
Traders may consider a long trade if the key level at 0.63910 is breached. Entry points near the coming higher lows (HL) or Fibonacci retracement levels like 0.236 or 0.382 are potential considerations.
ðŸ›‘ Risk Management:
Implementing effective risk management, including appropriate stop-loss orders, is crucial to safeguard capital.
ðŸ“ˆ Conclusion:
CADCHF presents a compelling long trade opportunity with bullish signals and strong market sentiment. Monitor the break above 0.63910 and adjust positions based on evolving market conditions.

author: /author/int-no_author
title: Eyeing waste, Japanese apparel industry pushes sustainable fashion
text:
The Japanese apparel industry is increasingly promoting the reuse of clothing as it hopes to make fashion more sustainable.
Overproduction and mass disposal of clothing, which causes massive greenhouse gas emissions, take a toll on the environment. About 60% of the clothes sold in Japan are thrown away, according to the Environment Ministry.
Apparel companies want consumers to enjoy what they call sustainable fashion with used clothing.
